name: Nature Wrath
description:
Nature Wrath its a college project game.

Based on tower defense/offensive  genre and some RPG elements, its a solo player game (for while).

The game language is pt-BR (Brasil Português). Some features will be created in future and it can be choosed other language (as english).

This game collects data from your computer as CPU, GPU and Memory infos for academic data and possible system bugs.
